arts.ttl: Declan Rice hails the ‚Äòunbelievable‚Äô impact of a substitute against Man City
arts.sum: ‚ÄúAt that point of the game, 60, 70, 80 minutes, the game's a completely different game to the start of the game, The game's opened up, more stretched, and for players like Gabi, they're unbelievable.‚Äù The team have lost ground in the Premier League title race, but the last week has highlighted how the strength in the squad should set them up to compete, and the midfielder applauded one man's "unbelievable" impact.

arts.ttl: Buoyant Pep Guardiola hails his Man City players for 'finding what they lost last season' - and insists he 'doesn't give a f***' about results after Gabriel Martinelli's last-gasp equaliser
arts.sum: JACK GAUGHAN: Gabriel Martinelli 's stoppage-time equaliser rescued a point for Arsenal but Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola still left the capital buoyant.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola had to mention Raheem Sterling because of what Arsenal did to Man City
Mikel Arteta overthought his tactical masterplan against Pep Guardiola ‚Äì Arsenal paid City too much respect
arts.sum: Arsenal 1-1 Manchester City: Erling Haaland struck early and the Gunners left it very late to reply through Gabriel Martinelli‚Äôs brilliantly taken stoppage-time equaliser

Pep Guardiola said he was made to "suffer" in Manchester City's 1-1 draw with Arsenal but he praised his team's resilience and said their body language and communication is getting back to the standards he expects.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta explains Noni Madueke substitution after unpopular Arsenal decision vs Man City
arts.sum: Noni Madueke had been one of Arsenal's few shining lights in the first-half against Manchester City but was replaced at half-time with Bukayo Saka coming on in his place

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola explains unusual Man City tactics in X-rated response after Arsenal draw
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola explained his surprising tactical approach with Manchester City after his side left the Emirates Stadium with a point following Gabriel Martinelli's 93rd-minute equaliser

arts.ttl: Gabriel Martinelli‚Äôs goal against Man City was predicted as private message revealed
36 touches, 4 clearances... ¬£26m Man City ace stopped Arsenal's most important threat in draw
Pep Guardiola bizarrely KISSES the fourth official moments before Gabriel Martinelli rescues late point for Arsenal with stoppage time equaliser against Man City
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola produced one of the strangest touchline moments of the Premier League season at the Emirates. The City boss leaned in to kiss fourth official Craig Pawson.
